product.title: Bella Sonar (Blackout)
product.description: Min width: 600mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 450mm max drop: 3500mm composition: polyester guarantee: 12 months stack: a choice of left, right or split. Fixings: top fix or face fix brackets. Buy made to measure bella sonar (blackout) blackout panel blinds from soeasy blinds.

relproducts.title: Splash Vine Green Panel Blind
relproducts.description: Their moisture-resistant splash vine green panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The lush green panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its calming, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.

relproducts.title: Splash Turquoise Blue Panel Blind
relproducts.description: Splash turquoise blue panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your window. The mid blue, moisture-resistant fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

relproducts.title: Bella Blackout Ruby Red Panel Blind
relproducts.description: Simple, bold and cohesive, their ruby red bella blackout panel blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout panel blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money.
